column1: '''Paul Nolan Hyde''' is a Professor of Linguistics at [[wikipedia:Brigham Young University|Brigham Young University]]. Introduced to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works in 1966
column2: Hyde has produced many essays on both the [[legendarium]] and the field of expertise of Tolkien
column3: [[Old English|Old]] and [[Middle English]]. Hyde is probably best known for his collumn "Quenti Lambardillion" in ''[[Mythlore]]'' and several contributions to ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]''.
